projects.name: Compact Carbon Capture
projects.description: Wordpress project made for Compact Carbon Capture AS. They wanted a website to display their technology, a machine that can capture CO2. They also wanted a dynamic website so they could post news and updates

projects.name: Game of Thrones Board Game
projects.description: This is a Game of Thrones themed board Game. Its mainly created with Javascript and the html5 canvas element.

projects.name: React Task
projects.description: This is the first proper React project i made. We used data from an api to display large amounts of data. Form validation, propType check and Component structure were also a big part of the assignment
